title: Removal of Previous Versions of Software and Firmware

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Remove previous versions of {{ si-2.6_prm_1 }} after updated versions have been installed.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Previous versions of software or firmware components that are not removed from the system after updates have been installed may be exploited by adversaries. Some products may automatically remove previous versions of software and firmware from the system.
